snippet.title: Round Ogre (Trailer)
snippet.description:
Round Ogre is a puzzle game about an Ogre trying to find the exit.

But in her enthusiasm, she keeps running farther than intended, encountering other creatures, and mostly falling asleep from exhaustion. And you better make sure she isn't in some dangerous spot when that happens ... 

500 puzzles, 30 worlds, loads of unique mechanics, all with one simple input (swipe to move) and one simple goal (get ogre to the exit).

Check the official page for more information: https://pandaqi.com/round-ogre

This game is a sort-of sequel to another one: https://pandaqi.com/square-ogre

Available on Windows, Mac, Linux and Android. A free version is available through the Play Store, powered by ads. The full version costs E 7,99.
